name: Naughty Memories: Asian Beauty
description:
Enjoy the classic card match gameplay and try to uncover high quality sexy girls gone wild! Earn all the stars to beat record scores and unlock achievements. This new series of Naughty Memories features a new theme with the hottest Asians.
15 challenging levels
Uncensored content
Beat the record times to earn stars
Realistic graphics
Atmospheric music
30 achievements
Display girls from the gallery
